title: Green synthesized nano silica: foliar and soil application provides drought endurance in Eleucine coracana
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00275J, Paper
Diksha Wahi, Komal Bisht, Sneh Gautam, Prafull Salvi, Pushpa Lohani
SiNPs mitigate drought stress in Eleucine coracana by improving its morpho-physiological attributes. SiNPs improved enzymatic and non-enzymatic potential of the plant by boosting its drought tolerance ability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
